login.intro_text: Enter your email and password to sign in.
login.account_error: Unable to log you in, please make sure you have entered the correct email and password.
register.intro_text: Please complete the form below to create an account.
register.account_error: Unable to create your user account.
form.validation_error: Please make sure you have filled in all fields correctly.
profile.required_fields: Your name and email must be completed. You only need to enter a password if you wish to modify your password.
fields.name: Name
fieldhint.password: The password requires an uppercase, lowercase, number and special character
toast.update_profile_success: Your profile has been successfully updated.
toast.update_profile_error: An error has occurred updating your profile.
toast.country_fetch_error: An error has occurred retrieving the countries.
toast.save_countries_error: An error has occurred saving your country selections.
toast.save_countries_success: Your country selections have been successfully saved.
toast.fetch_countries_error: An error has occurred retrieving your country selections for the given day.
toast.fetch_calendar_data_error: An error has occurred retrieving the calendar information.
calendar.modal_text: Please choose from the countries below. Type in a country name to filter the results.
404_text: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.
dashboard.fetch_error: An error has occurred fetching the dashboard data.
dashboard.no_data: You have not recorded your travels. Please click on the calendar link to do so.
